response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your high standards. This product, with its innovative features and unparalleled quality, is truly a game-changer in its field. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth every penny of its $15,000 worth. However, I understand the dynamics of negotiation and am willing to offer it to you at an exclusive price of $13,500. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a premium yet reasonable cost. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 13500}
